_meanings:
{@--3@}
Obstinate pertinacity in making a
demand, sitting without food 

before a person's house till he ceases
to oppose or refuse it (<ab>Mar.</ab> {#DaraRA#}).

{@--4@} [{#aDivAsayati devatA anena, karaRe GaY#}]
Consecration of an image especially
before the commencement of a 
sacrificial rite; see {#aDivAsanaM#} also.
